===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|竹|alt1=⺮|弟|c1=s|c2=p|t1=bamboo|ls=psc}}.

{{zh-l|*竹}} here refers to the bamboo strips used for writing (e.g. accounting, classification) in ancient times. See also {{zh-l|*等}}.
